title-group.article-title: Computation of Modified Bessel Functions and Their Ratios

abstract.p:
An efficient algorithm for calculating ratios $r_
u(x) = I_{
u+1}(x)/I_
u(x), 
u \geqq 0, x \geqq 0$, is presented. This algorithm in conjunction with the recursion relation for $r_
u(x)$ gives an alternative to other recursive methods for $I_
u(x)$ when approximations for low-order Bessel functions are available. Sharp bounds on $r_
u(x)$ and $I_
u(x)$ are also established in addition to some monotonicity properties of $r_
u(x)$ and $r_
u'(x)$.
